proposal1.heroHeadline: Unleashed is leaving money on the table. Here is exactly how much.
proposal1.heroSubheadline: Automate 100% of your proposal writing and reclaim up to 40 hours per week.
proposal1.problemsIntro: Six systemic issues affecting your growth and engineering bandwidth right now.

problems.title: Time-Consuming Proposal Writing
problems.description: Your team spends countless hours crafting proposals manually, leading to inefficient use of resources and significant opportunity costs.

problems.title: Inconsistent Proposal Quality
problems.description: Manual proposal writing results in varying quality, risking client dissatisfaction and potential project losses.

problems.title: Delayed Response Times
problems.description: Extended proposal writing timelines delay client responses, potentially costing you lucrative deals.

problems.title: High Operational Costs
problems.description: The labor-intensive process of proposal writing increases operational costs, impacting your bottom line.

problems.title: Limited Scalability
problems.description: As your business grows, the inability to quickly scale proposal generation limits your potential for taking on new projects.

problems.title: Strained Engineering Resources
problems.description: Engineering bandwidth is stretched as technical staff are often roped into the proposal process, detracting from core development work.

proposal1.solutionIntro: Five integrated workstreams covering every dimension of transformation.

solutions.title: Instant Proposal Generation
solutions.description: Harness AI to generate tailored proposals in seconds, drastically reducing time spent on each document.

solutions.title: Consistent Quality Assurance
solutions.description: Ensure every proposal meets the highest standards with AI-driven quality checks and templates.

solutions.title: Enhanced Client Engagement
solutions.description: Respond to client inquiries promptly with quick, precise, and personalized proposals.

solutions.title: Cost Reduction
solutions.description: Cut down on labor costs by automating the proposal process, allowing your team to focus on high-value tasks.

solutions.title: Scalable Solutions
solutions.description: Easily scale your operations to handle increased demand without sacrificing proposal quality or speed.

proposal1.whyUsIntro: Built by someone who understands both the engineering and the sales side.

whyUsCards.title: Speed
whyUsCards.description: From lead data to a live, branded proposal page in under 60 seconds. No templates. Every proposal is written from scratch.

whyUsCards.title: Personalization
whyUsCards.description: Every proposal is tailored to the prospect using their own website data. Their services, their tone, their positioning reflected back.

whyUsCards.title: Ownership
whyUsCards.description: You own the source code, the infrastructure, and the data. No SaaS fees, no monthly subscriptions, no vendor lock-in.

whyUsCards.title: Support
whyUsCards.description: Personal onboarding, a video walkthrough for your team, and one week of post-delivery support included in every build.

fearCards.title: Complex integrations do not scare us.
fearCards.sub: CRM, email, Google Sheets, Slack. We connect whatever you need.

fearCards.title: Your existing stack is not a problem.
fearCards.sub: The system works alongside your current tools. No migration headaches.

fearCards.title: We iterate until you are happy.
fearCards.sub: Revisions are part of the process. We do not stop until it fits.

proposal1.teamIntro: Your point of contact. No handoffs, no account managers.

team.name: Ayush Chauhan
team.bio: Full-stack engineer and founder of AOC. Builds AI automation systems for agencies and service businesses. Personally handles every engagement from architecture through deployment. Works async, ships fast.

proposal1.processIntro: What Working With Us Looks Like

process.title: Kickoff (Async or Call)
process.description: We discuss your workflow, your services, and how your team currently writes proposals. This can be a 15-minute call or handled entirely over email.

process.title: System Configuration
process.description: We configure the engine with your services, your pricing structure, your tone of voice, and your brand standards.

process.title: Build and QA
process.description: We generate test proposals, review output quality, and refine until the system matches your standards.

process.title: Deployment and Handoff
process.description: Deploy to production with full infrastructure. You receive a video walkthrough, documentation, and source code.

proposal1.pricingIntro: Two options. Both are one-time builds. You own everything.

pricing.name: Proposal Engine
pricing.subtitle: // Core System
pricing.description: Custom proposal generation built specifically for Unleashed.

pricing.name: Engine + AI Chatbot
pricing.subtitle: // Recommended
pricing.description: Everything above, plus an AI closer embedded in every proposal.
features: AI chatbot on every proposal page

proposal1.ctaHeadline: Want to see this running on your actual proposals?
proposal1.ctaDescription: Reply here or email Ayush directly. He will send the onboarding form. Takes about 10 minutes and the build starts the same day.

proposal2.heroHeadline: Transforming Acme Corp's Digital Experience Into a Growth Engine
proposal2.heroSubheadline: A structured engagement plan for website redesign, product UX, and ongoing digital performance. Built for where you are heading.
proposal2.problemsIntro: Six friction points costing your business growth, trust, and engineering bandwidth right now.

problems.title: Brand and Product Disconnect
problems.description: Your website communicates reliability, but your product interface tells a different story.

problems.title: Inefficient User Journeys
problems.description: Users struggle to find information, leading to drop-offs and lost conversions.

problems.title: Outdated Design
problems.description: Visual aesthetics do not reflect the innovation and quality of your products.

problems.title: Slow Load Times
problems.description: Page speed issues are affecting user satisfaction and SEO rankings.

problems.title: Lack of Mobile Optimization
problems.description: The current site experience on mobile devices is subpar, affecting engagement.

problems.title: Limited Analytics Insights
problems.description: Insufficient data hinders your ability to make informed business decisions.

proposal2.solutionIntro: Four integrated workstreams designed to address every problem area identified above.
proposal2.whyUsIntro: We are a process-driven digital agency founded on continuous improvement and radical transparency.

whyUsCards.title: Process Driven
whyUsCards.description: Every engagement follows a structured methodology.

whyUsCards.title: Data-Driven Decisions
whyUsCards.description: Using analytics to guide our strategies and deliver measurable results.

whyUsCards.title: Collaborative Approach
whyUsCards.description: Partnership model that emphasizes open communication.

whyUsCards.title: Scalable Solutions
whyUsCards.description: Designing systems that grow with your business needs.

proposal2.teamIntro: Where creative energy meets operational rigour. Your engagement is led by our founders.
proposal2.processIntro: What Working With Us Looks Like

process.title: Design and Prototype
process.description: Crafting the visual and experiential framework.

process.title: Development and Testing
process.description: Building and iterating based on feedback.

process.title: Launch and Optimize
process.description: Deploying and refining for continuous improvement.

proposal2.pricingIntro: Transparent, tier-based options. Choose the level of transformation that fits your priorities.

pricing.name: Foundation
pricing.description: Website redesign focused on brand alignment.

pricing.name: Growth
pricing.description: Website redesign plus product UX strategy.

pricing.name: Partnership
pricing.description: Full digital transformation with ongoing optimization.

proposal2.ctaDescription: If this resonates, we would love 15 minutes of your time. No slides, no pitch deck.
proposal2.footerSub: Designing better systems for better experiences

lead.company_description:
Unleashed is a one-stop shop for leading web development, custom software and digital services. We create, enhance, integrate, manage, and host award-winning websites, web applications, and digital experiences through the continuous efforts of our certified developers and a team of creative digital strategists. At Unleashed, we utilize open-source platforms‚Äîthe most collaborative and dynamic solutions available for our clients' websites and system integrations. 
By living on the cutting edge of web technology and development, Unleashed has the proven experience and expertise to create award-winning digital experiences. As globally recognized web experts, we are committed to positioning our clients to fully realize digital potential through dynamic, engaging websites using open-source solutions. 

We're not afraid... 
...of inheriting legacy code. 
...of complex, third-party integrations. 
...of responding to your evolving needs. 

OUR SERVICES INCLUDE: 
:: Open Source Platforms (i.e., WordPress, Drupal, Symfony, Adobe Commerce)
:: Responsive Web Design
:: Web App Development
:: Optimization
:: Web Accessibility & Compliance
:: Systems Integrations
:: Web Personalization
:: e-Commerce Implementation
:: Creative and Design Services
:: DevOps and Hosting Services
:: Digital Marketing Services
:: Ongoing Support Services
lead.headline: CEO @unleashed Technologies | Solving Your Digital/AI Needs In Manufacturing, Associations & Life Sciences
lead.company_technologies: ai, android, bluekai, cloudflare, cloudflare hosting, cloudflare dns, drupal, flutter, gmail, google apps, iot, magento, microsoft office 365, outlook, python, rackspace mailgun, react, remote, sharepoint
